        @Nonnull
protected InstrumentationConfiguration createClassLoaderConfig(org.junit.runners.model.FrameworkMethod method)

        Create an InstrumentationConfiguration suitable for the provided FrameworkMethod.

        Custom TestRunner subclasses may wish to override this method to provide alternate configuration.

        Parameters:
        method - the test method that’s about to run
        Returns:
